Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui

Class GUI

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.GUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
Ui
public class GUI
extends java.lang.Object
implements Ui
Class that implements the GUI of the game.
Since:
1.0
